titleStmt.title: Christ evidenced to be the amen, truth it self, in the three most important significations thereof whereby the foundation of our religion, the ground of our faith, and the infallible authority of the Holy Scriptures are established : which were delivered in a sermon preached October 14th before the Right Worshipful the mayor, recorder, aldermen, and sheriff, on the morning, at St. Nicholas Church in the town and county of New-Castle, upon Tyne / by Thomas Davison ...
titleStmt.author: Davison, Thomas, b. 1639 or 40.
